00038 #include "../../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"
00039 
00040 template<typename d_type>
00041 struct BigRangeVarContainer;
00042 
00043 template<typename d_type>
00044 struct BigRangeVarRef_internal_template
00045 {
00046   static const BOOL isBool = false;
00047   static const BoundType isBoundConst = Bound_No;
00048   static string name() { return "LongRange"; }
00049   BOOL isBound() const
00050   { return false;}
00051   
00052   int var_num;
00053 
00054 #ifdef MANY_VAR_CONTAINERS
00055   BigRangeVarContainer<d_type>* rangeCon;
00056   BigRangeVarContainer<d_type>& getCon() const { return *rangeCon; }
00057 
00058   BigRangeVarRef_internal_template() : var_num(-1), rangeCon(NULL)
00059   {}
00060 
00061   explicit BigRangeVarRef_internal_template(BigRangeVarContainer<d_type>* con, int i) : 
00062   var_num(i), rangeCon(con)
00063   {}  
00064 #else
00065   static BigRangeVarContainer<d_type>& getCon_Static();
00066   BigRangeVarRef_internal_template() : var_num(-1)
00067   {}
00068   
00069   explicit BigRangeVarRef_internal_template(BigRangeVarContainer<d_type>*, int i) : 
00070   var_num(i)
00071   {}    
00072 #endif  
00073 
00074 };
00075 
00076 #ifdef MORE_SEARCH_INFO
00077 typedef InfoRefType<VarRefType<BigRangeVarRef_internal_template<BitContainerType> >, VAR_INFO_BIGRANGEVAR> BigRangeVarRef;
00078 #else
00079 typedef VarRefType<BigRangeVarRef_internal_template<BitContainerType> > BigRangeVarRef;
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 template<typename d_type>
00083 struct BigRangeVarContainer {
00084   typedef BigRangeVarRef_internal_template<BitContainerType> BigRangeVarRef_internal;
00085 
00086   StateObj* stateObj;
00087   
00088   BigRangeVarContainer(StateObj* _stateObj) : stateObj(_stateObj),
00089                                               bms_array(&getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet()),
00090                                               trigger_list(stateObj, false),
00091                                               var_count_m(0), lock_m(0)
00092   { 
00093     // Store where the first variable will go.
00094     var_offset.push_back(0);
00095   }
00096   
00097   typedef DomainInt domain_bound_type;
00098   static const d_type one = static_cast<d_type>(1);
00099   MoveablePointer bound_data;
00100   MonotonicSet *bms_array;
00101   TriggerList trigger_list;
00102 
00104   vector<pair<int,int> > initial_bounds;
00106   vector<int> var_offset;
00108   vector<vector<AbstractConstraint*> > constraints;
00109 #ifdef WDEG
00110   vector<unsigned int> wdegs;
00111 #endif
00112   
00113  
00114   unsigned var_count_m;
00115   BOOL lock_m;
00116   
00117   domain_bound_type& lower_bound(BigRangeVarRef_internal i) const
00118   { return static_cast<domain_bound_type*>(bound_data.get_ptr())[i.var_num*2]; }
00119   
00120   domain_bound_type& upper_bound(BigRangeVarRef_internal i) const
00121   { return static_cast<domain_bound_type*>(bound_data.get_ptr())[i.var_num*2 + 1]; }
00122     
00126   DomainInt find_new_upper_bound(BigRangeVarRef_internal d)
00127   {
00128     DomainInt lower = lower_bound(d); 
00129     DomainInt old_up_bound = upper_bound(d);
00130     DomainInt loopvar = old_up_bound; 
00131     //DomainInt low_bound = initial_bounds[d.var_num].first; 
00132     if(loopvar < lower)
00133     {
00134       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00136       return upper_bound(d);
00137     }
00138     if(bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + loopvar) && (loopvar >= lower))
00139       return upper_bound(d);
00140     --loopvar;
00141     for(; loopvar >= lower; --loopvar)
00142     {
00143       if(bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + loopvar)) 
00144         return loopvar;
00145     }
00146     getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00147     return old_up_bound;
00148   }
00149   
00153   DomainInt find_new_lower_bound(BigRangeVarRef_internal d)
00154   {
00155     DomainInt upper = upper_bound(d); 
00156     DomainInt old_low_bound = lower_bound(d);
00157     DomainInt loopvar = old_low_bound; 
00158     //DomainInt low_bound = initial_bounds[d.var_num].first; 
00159     if(loopvar > upper)
00160     {
00161       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00163       return lower_bound(d);
00164     }
00165     if(bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + loopvar) && (loopvar <= upper))
00166       return lower_bound(d);
00167     ++loopvar;
00168     for(; loopvar <= upper; ++loopvar)
00169     {
00170       if(bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + loopvar)) 
00171         return loopvar;
00172     }
00173     getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00174     return old_low_bound;
00175   }
00176   
00177  void lock()
00178   { 
00179     D_ASSERT(!lock_m);
00180     lock_m = true;
00181     //bms_array->lock(stateObj); // gets locked in constraint_setup.cpp
00182  }
00183 
00184 void addVariables(const vector<pair<int, Bounds> >& new_domains)
00185 {
00186   D_ASSERT(!lock_m);
00187   for(int i = 0; i < new_domains.size(); ++i)
00188   {
00189     for(int j = 0; j < new_domains[i].first; ++j)
00190     {
00191       initial_bounds.push_back(make_pair(new_domains[i].second.lower_bound, new_domains[i].second.upper_bound));
00192       int domain_size;
00193       domain_size = new_domains[i].second.upper_bound - new_domains[i].second.lower_bound + 1;
00194       var_offset.push_back( var_offset.back() + domain_size);
00195       var_count_m++;
00196     }
00197     constraints.resize(var_count_m);
00198 #ifdef WDEG
00199     if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on) wdegs.resize(var_count_m);
00200 #endif
00201   }
00202 
00203  
00204     bound_data = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().request_bytes(var_count_m * 2 * sizeof(domain_bound_type));
00205     int temp1=bms_array->request_storage(var_offset.back());
00206     D_ASSERT(temp1==0); // we should be at the front of the TMS.
00207     if(temp1>0)
00208     {   // Need to add the TMS offset onto all the var_offsets
00209         for(int i=0;i<var_offset.size(); i++) var_offset[i]+=temp1;
00210     }
00211     //bms_array->lock(stateObj); // Don't lock it here. lock it in lock.
00212     for(DomainInt j = 0; j < var_count_m; j++) {
00213            var_offset[j] = var_offset[j] - initial_bounds[j].first;  
00214     };
00215     
00216     domain_bound_type* bound_ptr = static_cast<domain_bound_type*>(bound_data.get_ptr());
00217     
00218     int min_domain_val = 0;
00219     int max_domain_val = 0;
00220     if(!initial_bounds.empty())
00221     {
00222       min_domain_val = initial_bounds[0].first;
00223       max_domain_val = initial_bounds[0].second;
00224       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < var_count_m; ++i)
00225       {
00226         bound_ptr[2*i] = initial_bounds[i].first;
00227         bound_ptr[2*i+1] = initial_bounds[i].second;
00228       
00229         min_domain_val = mymin(initial_bounds[i].first, min_domain_val);
00230         max_domain_val = mymax(initial_bounds[i].second, max_domain_val);
00231       }
00232     }
00233     trigger_list.lock(var_count_m, min_domain_val, max_domain_val);
00234   }
00235   
00236   BOOL isAssigned(BigRangeVarRef_internal d) const
00237   { 
00238     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00239     return lower_bound(d) == upper_bound(d); 
00240   }
00241   
00242   DomainInt getAssignedValue(BigRangeVarRef_internal d) const
00243   {
00244     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00245     D_ASSERT(isAssigned(d));
00246     return getMin(d);
00247   }
00248   
00249   BOOL inDomain(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt i) const
00250   {
00251     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00252     if (i < lower_bound(d) || i > upper_bound(d))
00253       return false;
00254     return bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + i);
00255   }
00256   
00257   // Warning: If this is ever changed, be sure to check through the code for other places
00258   // where bms_array is used directly.
00259   BOOL inDomain_noBoundCheck(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt i) const
00260   {
00261     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00262     D_ASSERT(i >= lower_bound(d));
00263     D_ASSERT(i <= upper_bound(d));
00264     return bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + i );
00265   }
00266   
00267   DomainInt getMin(BigRangeVarRef_internal d) const
00268   {
00269     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00270     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00271     return lower_bound(d);
00272   }
00273   
00274   DomainInt getMax(BigRangeVarRef_internal d) const
00275   {
00276     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00277     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00278     return upper_bound(d);
00279   }
00280   
00281   DomainInt getInitialMin(BigRangeVarRef_internal d) const
00282   { return initial_bounds[d.var_num].first; }
00283   
00284   DomainInt getInitialMax(BigRangeVarRef_internal d) const
00285   { return initial_bounds[d.var_num].second; }
00286    
00287   void removeFromDomain(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt i)
00288   {
00289 #ifdef DEBUG
00290     cout << "Calling removeFromDomain: " << d.var_num << " " << i << " [" 
00291          << lower_bound(d) << ":" << upper_bound(d) << "] original ["
00292          << getInitialMin(d) << ":" << getInitialMax(d) << "]"
00293          << endl;
00294     //bms_pointer(d)->print_state();
00295     bms_array->print_state();
00296 #endif
00297     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00298     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00299 if((i < lower_bound(d)) || (i > upper_bound(d)) || ! (bms_array->ifMember_remove(var_offset[d.var_num] + i) ))
00300     {
00301 #ifdef DEBUG
00302       cout << "Exiting removeFromDomain: " << d.var_num << " nothing to do" << endl;
00303 #endif
00304       return;
00305     }
00306 #ifdef FULL_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00307     trigger_list.push_domain_removal(d.var_num, i);
00308 #endif
00309 #ifndef NO_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00310     trigger_list.push_domain_changed(d.var_num);
00311 #endif
00312     D_ASSERT( ! bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + i));
00313     
00314     domain_bound_type up_bound = upper_bound(d);
00315     if(i == up_bound)
00316     {
00317       upper_bound(d) = find_new_upper_bound(d);
00318       trigger_list.push_upper(d.var_num, up_bound - upper_bound(d));
00319     }
00320     
00321     domain_bound_type low_bound = lower_bound(d);
00322     if(i == low_bound)
00323     {
00324       lower_bound(d) = find_new_lower_bound(d);
00325       trigger_list.push_lower(d.var_num, lower_bound(d) - low_bound);
00326     }
00327     
00328     if(upper_bound(d) == lower_bound(d)) {
00329       trigger_list.push_assign(d.var_num, getAssignedValue(d));
00330     }
00331 
00332     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00333 
00334 #ifdef DEBUG
00335     cout << "Exiting removeFromDomain: " << d.var_num << " " << i << " [" 
00336          << lower_bound(d) << ":" << upper_bound(d) << "] original ["
00337          << getInitialMin(d) << ":" << getInitialMax(d) << "]"
00338          << endl;
00339     bms_array->print_state();
00340 #endif
00341     return;
00342   }
00343 
00344   BOOL validAssignment(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt offset, DomainInt lower, DomainInt upper)
00345   {
00346     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00347     if(!inDomain(d,offset))
00348     {
00349       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true); 
00350       return false;
00351     }
00352     if(offset == upper && offset == lower)
00353       return false;
00354     if(offset > upper || offset < lower)
00355     {
00356       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00357       return false;
00358     }
00359     return true;
00360   }    
00361   
00362   void propagateAssign(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt offset)
00363   {
00364     DomainInt lower = lower_bound(d);
00365     DomainInt upper = upper_bound(d);
00366     if(!validAssignment(d, offset, lower, upper)) return;
00367     commonAssign(d, offset, lower, upper);
00368   }
00369 
00370   void uncheckedAssign(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt i)
00371   { 
00372     D_ASSERT(inDomain(d,i));
00373     D_ASSERT(!isAssigned(d));
00374     commonAssign(d,i, lower_bound(d), upper_bound(d)); 
00375   }
00376 
00377   void decisionAssign(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt i)
00378   {
00379     D_ASSERT(inDomain(d,i));
00380     D_ASSERT(!isAssigned(d));
00381     commonAssign(d,i, lower_bound(d), upper_bound(d)); 
00382   }
00383     
00384 private:
00385   // This function just unifies part of propagateAssign and uncheckedAssign
00386   void commonAssign(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt offset, DomainInt lower, DomainInt upper)
00387   {
00388 #ifdef FULL_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00389     // TODO : Optimise this function to only check values in domain.
00390     int domainOffset = var_offset[d.var_num] /*- initial_bounds[d.var_num].first*/;
00391     for(DomainInt loop = lower; loop <= upper; ++loop)
00392     {
00393       // def of inDomain: bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + i - initial_bounds[d.var_num].first);
00394       if(bms_array->isMember(loop + domainOffset) && loop != offset) {
00395         trigger_list.push_domain_removal(d.var_num, loop);
00396       }
00397     }
00398 #endif
00399     trigger_list.push_domain_changed(d.var_num);
00400     trigger_list.push_assign(d.var_num, offset);
00401     
00402     DomainInt low_bound = lower_bound(d);
00403     if(offset != low_bound)
00404     {
00405       trigger_list.push_lower(d.var_num, offset - low_bound);
00406       lower_bound(d) = offset;
00407     }
00408     
00409     DomainInt up_bound = upper_bound(d);
00410     if(offset != up_bound)
00411     {
00412       trigger_list.push_upper(d.var_num, up_bound - offset);
00413       upper_bound(d) = offset;
00414     }
00415     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00416   }    
00417 public:
00418 
00419   
00420   void setMax(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt offset)
00421   {
00422 #ifdef DEBUG
00423     cout << "Calling setMax: " << d.var_num << " " << offset << " [" 
00424          << lower_bound(d) << ":" << upper_bound(d) << "] original ["
00425          << getInitialMin(d) << ":" << getInitialMax(d) << "]"
00426          << endl;
00427     bms_array->print_state();
00428 #endif
00429 
00430     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00431     DomainInt up_bound = upper_bound(d);
00432     DomainInt low_bound = lower_bound(d);
00433     
00434     if(offset < low_bound)
00435     {
00436       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00437       return;
00438     }
00439     
00440     if(offset < up_bound)
00441     {
00442 #ifdef FULL_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00443       // TODO : Optimise this function to only check values in domain.
00444       int domainOffset = var_offset[d.var_num] /*- initial_bounds[d.var_num].first*/;
00445       for(DomainInt loop = offset + 1; loop <= up_bound; ++loop)
00446       {
00447         // Def of inDomain: bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + i - initial_bounds[d.var_num].first);
00448         if(bms_array->isMember(domainOffset + loop)) {
00449           trigger_list.push_domain_removal(d.var_num, loop);
00450         }
00451       }
00452 #endif   
00453       upper_bound(d) = offset;      
00454       DomainInt new_upper = find_new_upper_bound(d);
00455       upper_bound(d) = new_upper;
00456       
00457 #ifndef NO_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00458     trigger_list.push_domain_changed(d.var_num);
00459 #endif
00460        trigger_list.push_upper(d.var_num, up_bound - upper_bound(d));
00461       
00462       if(lower_bound(d) == upper_bound(d)) {
00463         trigger_list.push_assign(d.var_num, getAssignedValue(d));
00464       }
00465     }
00466     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00467 #ifdef DEBUG
00468     cout << "Exiting setMax: " << d.var_num << " " << upper_bound(d) << " [" 
00469          << lower_bound(d) << ":" << upper_bound(d) << "] original ["
00470          << getInitialMin(d) << ":" << getInitialMax(d) << "]"
00471          << endl;
00472     bms_array->print_state();
00473 #endif
00474   }
00475   
00476   void setMin(BigRangeVarRef_internal d, DomainInt offset)
00477   {
00478 #ifdef DEBUG
00479     cout << "Calling setMin: " << d.var_num << " " << offset << " [" 
00480          << lower_bound(d) << ":" << upper_bound(d) << "] original ["
00481          << getInitialMin(d) << ":" << getInitialMax(d) << "]"
00482          << endl;
00483     bms_array->print_state();
00484 #endif
00485     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00486 
00487     DomainInt up_bound = upper_bound(d);
00488     DomainInt low_bound = lower_bound(d);
00489     
00490     if(offset > up_bound)
00491     {
00492       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00493       return;
00494     }
00495     
00496     if(offset > low_bound)
00497     {
00498 #ifdef FULL_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00499       // TODO : Optimise this function to only check values in domain.
00500       int domainOffset = var_offset[d.var_num] /*- initial_bounds[d.var_num].first*/;
00501       for(DomainInt loop = low_bound; loop < offset; ++loop)
00502       {
00503         // def of inDomain: bms_array->isMember(var_offset[d.var_num] + i - initial_bounds[d.var_num].first);
00504         if(bms_array->isMember(loop + domainOffset)) {
00505           trigger_list.push_domain_removal(d.var_num, loop);
00506         }
00507       }
00508 #endif
00509     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00510 
00511     lower_bound(d) = offset;
00512     DomainInt new_lower = find_new_lower_bound(d);    
00513     lower_bound(d) = new_lower; 
00514     
00515 #ifndef NO_DOMAIN_TRIGGERS
00516     trigger_list.push_domain_changed(d.var_num);
00517 #endif
00518     trigger_list.push_lower(d.var_num, lower_bound(d) - low_bound);
00519     if(lower_bound(d) == upper_bound(d)) {
00520       trigger_list.push_assign(d.var_num, getAssignedValue(d)); 
00521     }
00522     }
00523     D_ASSERT(getState(stateObj).isFailed() || ( inDomain(d, lower_bound(d)) && inDomain(d, upper_bound(d)) ) );
00524 #ifdef DEBUG
00525     cout << "Exiting setMin: " << d.var_num << " " << lower_bound(d) << " [" 
00526          << lower_bound(d) << ":" << upper_bound(d) << "] original ["
00527          << getInitialMin(d) << ":" << getInitialMax(d) << "]"
00528          << endl;
00529     bms_array->print_state();
00530 #endif
00531   }
00532   
00533   BigRangeVarRef get_var_num(int i);
00534   BigRangeVarRef get_new_var(int i, int j);
00535 
00536   void addTrigger(BigRangeVarRef_internal b, Trigger t, TrigType type)
00537   { D_ASSERT(lock_m); trigger_list.add_trigger(b.var_num, t, type);  }
00538   
00539 #ifdef DYNAMICTRIGGERS
00540   void addDynamicTrigger(BigRangeVarRef_internal b, DynamicTrigger* t, TrigType type, DomainInt pos = NoDomainValue BT_FUNDEF)
00541   {  
00542     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00543     D_ASSERT(b.var_num >= 0);
00544     D_ASSERT(b.var_num <= (int)var_count_m);
00545     D_ASSERT(type != DomainRemoval || (pos >= getInitialMin(b) && pos <= getInitialMax(b)));
00546     trigger_list.addDynamicTrigger(b.var_num, t, type, pos BT_CALL); 
00547   }
00548 #endif
00549 
00550   vector<AbstractConstraint*>* getConstraints(const BigRangeVarRef_internal& b)
00551   { return &constraints[b.var_num]; }
00552 
00553   void addConstraint(const BigRangeVarRef_internal& b, AbstractConstraint* c)
00554   { 
00555     constraints[b.var_num].push_back(c); 
00556 #ifdef WDEG
00557     if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on) wdegs[b.var_num] += c->getWdeg(); //add constraint score to base var wdeg
00558 #endif
00559   }
00560 
00561   DomainInt getBaseVal(const BigRangeVarRef_internal& b, DomainInt v) const 
00562   {
00563     D_ASSERT(inDomain(b, v));
00564     return v; 
00565   }
00566 
00567   Var getBaseVar(const BigRangeVarRef_internal& b) const
00568   { return Var(VAR_DISCRETE, b.var_num); }
00569 
00570 #ifdef WDEG
00571   int getBaseWdeg(const BigRangeVarRef_internal& b)
00572   { return wdegs[b.var_num]; }
00573 
00574   void incWdeg(const BigRangeVarRef_internal& b)
00575   { wdegs[b.var_num]++; }
00576 #endif
00577 
00578   ~BigRangeVarContainer() { 
00579     for(unsigned i=0; i < var_count_m ; i++) {
00580          // should delete space really!
00581     } ;
00582   }
00583 };
00584 
00585 template<typename T>
00586 inline BigRangeVarRef
00587 BigRangeVarContainer<T>::get_var_num(int i)
00588 {
00589   D_ASSERT(i < var_count_m);
00590   return BigRangeVarRef(BigRangeVarRef_internal(this, i));
